newsitem.title: USA: S.Arabia renews cooperation pledge on Dhahran bomb.
newsitem.headline: S.Arabia renews cooperation pledge on Dhahran bomb.

text.p: Saudi Arabia on Thursday renewed pledges of cooperation with the United States in the investigation of a truck bombing that killed 19 U.S. troops and Washington said it hoped they would be fulfilled.

"We've been assured of continued Saudi cooperation and intention to work very effectively and completely with the United States, but specifically with the FBI, in our ongoing investigation," State Department spokesman Nicholas Burns said.
